languages.text: "Ты облачился в металл, жрец. Он обманет старость, но не смерть".
"You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."
languages.original_text: "Ты облачился в металл, жрец. Он обманет старость, но не смерть".

traits.locale_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. It may trick age, but not death."
"You have encased yourself in metal, priest. It may trick age, but not death."
"You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."
"You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."
"You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."
"You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."
"You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."

languages.text: "Ihr habt Euch mit Metall umhüllt, Priester. Das Alter mögt Ihr auf diese Weise überlisten, den Tod könnt Ihr jedoch nicht überlisten."
languages.original_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Euch mit Metall umhüllt, Priester. Das Alter mögt Ihr auf diese Weise überlisten, den Tod könnt Ihr jedoch nicht überlisten."

languages.text: « Vous vous êtes enfermé dans un carcan de métal, prêtre. Peut-être échappez-vous ainsi au temps qui passe, mais vous aurez beau faire, la mort finira par vous rattraper. »
languages.original_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous êtes enfermé dans un carcan de métal, prêtre. Peut-être échappez-vous ainsi au temps qui passe, mais vous aurez beau faire, la mort finira par vous rattraper. »

languages.text: «Se ha cubierto de metal, sacerdote. Puede engañar así a la edad, pero no a la muerte».
languages.original_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha cubierto de metal, sacerdote. Puede engañar así a la edad, pero no a la muerte».

languages.text: 「司祭よ、あなたは自分自身を金属で包んでいる。こうして年を欺くことはできても、死を欺くことはできないわ」
languages.original_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."

traits.locale_text: 「司祭よ、あなたは自分自身を金属で包んでいる。こうして年を欺くことはできても、死を欺くことはできないわ」

languages.text: “你把自己包裹在金属之中，神甫。你可以用这种手段欺瞒岁月，但你无法欺瞒死亡。”
languages.original_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."

traits.locale_text: “你把自己包裹在金属之中，神甫。你可以用这种手段欺瞒岁月，但你无法欺瞒死亡。”

languages.original_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."

languages.text: "Kendini metalle kaplamışsın rahip. Geçen yılları bu şekilde saklayabilirsin ancak ölümü kandıramazsın."
languages.original_text: "You have encased yourself in metal, priest. You may trick age this way, but you cannot trick death."
